title: Breaking Down ‘Game of Thrones,’ S8E4 | The Watch
description:
Chris and Andy give their mixed reactions to "The Last of the Starks" (1:10). They talk about some characters on the periphery of the episode (14:45), the departure of Ghost (31:50), and their favorite moments (39:19).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
